pages.text: The Excavator is one of the pinnacles of modern engineering. It is able to dig up $(l:patchouli:overview/mineral_deposits)minerals$() from veins inaccessible by normal mining. In return however, the excavator is a complex structure which requires 4096 Flux/t in order to operate.

pages.name: Excavator
pages.text: The structure is built from the following $(t:26 Steel Scaffolding Blocks, 16 Steel Sheetmetal Blocks, 9 Blocks of Steel, 9 Light Engineering Blocks, 4 Heavy Engineering Blocks, 3 Radiator Blocks, and A Redstone Engineering Block.)$(#007500)blocks$().

To form the multiblock, right-click on the Heavy engineering block on the back of the machine with an Engineer's Hammer. $(br2)The energy input for the engine is on its side, the back features a redstone control panel and the item output. As the excavator digs up ores, the yield of the vein slowly decreases, but a vein of minerals can provide up to 38400 blocks of ore.
